Welcome to the website of *Spatial Microsimulation with R*, a book about modelling individual-level data within administrative zones. The aim is to provide an introduction to the topic, with practical examples implemented in the powerful statistical software R.

This book is in preparation for publication in CRC Press's [R series](http://www.crcpress.com/browse/series/crctherser).  This wiki serves as a place to take an early peak at some of the topics covered and allows instant access to updates.
